citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45 PM on
7/16/2024.
The inspector arrived at 1:45 PM on 7/16/24 to conduct an inspection. The inspector contacted the Licensee by phone
upon arrival and learned that they were at a distant off-site location and were not available today.
An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative
available to accompany the inspector. Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA
Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45 PM on 
7/16/2024.  
 
The inspector arrived at 1:45 PM on 7/16/24 to conduct an inspection. The inspector contacted the Licensee by phone 
upon arrival and learned that they were at a distant off-site location and were not available today.  
 
An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative 
available to accompany the inspector. Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA 
Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
